cascadiaCode.description: This is Microsoft's Cascadia Code font, originally designed for the new Windows Terminal.
cascadiaCode.releaseNotes: Updated for 1911.20 release of Cascadia Code
cascadiaCode.tags: cascadia code cascadiacode font windowsterminal terminal

cascadiaMono.description: This is Microsoft's Cascadia Mono font, based on Cascadia Code but without ligatures, originally designed for the new Windows Terminal.
cascadiaMono.releaseNotes: Initial release for 1911.20 release of Cascadia Mono
cascadiaMono.tags: cascadia mono cascadiamono font windowsterminal terminal

cascadiaCodePL.description: This is Microsoft's Cascadia Code PL font (Cascadia Code with powerline symbols), originally designed for the new Windows Terminal.
cascadiaCodePL.releaseNotes: Initial release for 1911.20 release of Cascadia Code PL
cascadiaCodePL.tags: cascadia code cascadiacode cascadiacodepl font windowsterminal terminal

cascadiaMonoPL.description: This is Microsoft's Cascadia Mono PL font (Cascadia Mono with powerline symbols), based on Cascadia Code but without ligatures, originally designed for the new Windows Terminal.
cascadiaMonoPL.releaseNotes: Initial release for 1911.20 release of Cascadia Mono PL
cascadiaMonoPL.tags: cascadia mono cascadiamono cascadiamonopl font windowsterminal terminal
